statement.p: Out of the last 46 days, it rained 16 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{16}}{{46}}={0.34782608695652}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.34782608695652}={34.782608695652} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 34.78 .
